description: The notification indicates a change in the operational state of the IUM server.

event.Summary: IUM server $v2 state changed from $v3 to $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IUM-MGMT-MIB::serverStateChangeNotification IUM-MGMT-MIB::hostName s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::srvName s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::oldSrvState i 1 IUM-MGMT-MIB::newSrvState i 1

description: The IUM host name.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::hostName

description: The IUM server name.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::srvName

description: The previous state of IUM server.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::oldSrvState

description: The new state of IUM server.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::newSrvState

description: The SNMP notification that is generated when some IUM component emits an alarm notification.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmNotification IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeqNumber i 9999 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeverity i 1 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmType s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmTimestamp s EXAMPLEE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmNotificationId s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmManagedObject s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmMessage s EXAMPLE

description: The notification sequence number within the source object.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeqNumber

description: The severity of active alarm.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeverity

description: The string value of alarm type.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmType

description: The local date and time when the alarm has occurred.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmTimestamp

description: The notification ID to correlate active and clearing alarms.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmNotificationId

description: The name of the source of alarm.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmManagedObject

description: The message string of this alarm. It contains in a string, which could be the explanation of the alarm for displaying to a user.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmMessage

description: The SNMP notification that is generated by the threshold management subsystem when observed
attribute is reaching or crossing predefined threshold level and direction.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IUM-MGMT-MIB::pmAlarmNotification IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeqNumber i 9999 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeverity i 1 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmTimestamp s EXAMPLEE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmNotificationId s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmObservedObject s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmObservedAttribute s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmThresholdDirection i 1 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmThresholdValue C 9999 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCurrentValue C 9999

description: The notification sequence number within the source object.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeqNumber

description: The severity of active alarm.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeverity

description: The local date and time when the alarm has occurred.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmTimestamp

description: The notification ID to correlate active and clearing alarms.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmNotificationId

description: The name of observed object.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmObservedObject

description: The name of observed attribute.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmObservedAttribute

description: Describes direction in which threshold is triggered.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmThresholdDirection

description: The value of triggered threshold.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmThresholdValue

description: The value of observer attribute.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCurrentValue

description: The custom SNMP notification triggered by user IUM configuration.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustomNotification IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustomCi s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeverity i 1 IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustomMsgGroup s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmManagedObject s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmMessage s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustom1 s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustom2 s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustom3 s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustom4 s EXAMPLE IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustom5 s EXAMPLE

description: Custom server CI object.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustomCi

description: The severity of active alarm.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmSeverity

description: Custom value of a message group.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustomMsgGroup

description: The name of the source of alarm.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmManagedObject

description: The message string of this alarm. It contains in a string, which could be the explanation of the alarm for displaying to a user.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmMessage

description: Custom value for additional info.
variables.name: IUM-MGMT-MIB::alarmCustom1

description: Custom value for additional info.

description: Custom value for additional info.
